name: Dam Guardian
description:
You are a Viking guardian, chosen to defend the city`s dam.

Stop the evil skeletons from blowing holes in the dam. 

Should they make it anyway, you can repair the holes with shields.

KNOWN BUGS:

- The mouse sensitivity can be really slow, i am working on that problem. You can try to increase the Graphic setting to "High" or "Ultra". Oddly, that helps a little.

The game was created in the course of the first game jam I participated in.

Used Assets:

SYNTY Studios : Polygon-NaturePack,  Polygon-Vikings, Polygon-DungeonPack

Explosive: RPG Character Mecanim Animation

John Leonard French: Ultimate Game Music Collection
